alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:24AM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Areas of moderate to locally heavy snow above 5000 feet continuing through Monday afternoon. Areas of snow becoming more showery Monday evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...Areas near Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 3 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Forest Lakes 7 to 11 inches Heber-Overgaard 4 to 6 inches Payson 3 to 5 inches Pine-Strawberry 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
